description: RQD contains the detail for each requisitioned item.

fields.name: Requisition Line Number
fields.description: This field contains the number that identifies this line in the requisition.

fields.name: Item Code - Internal
fields.description: This field contains the identifier and description that uniquely identify the item on the application sending the requisition. This field is conditional because at least one of the three fields RQD-2-item code- internal, RQD-3-item code-external, or RQD-4-hospital item code must be valued.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: An alternate sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: Item Code - External
fields.description: This field contains the identifier and description that uniquely identify the item on the application receiving the requisition. This field is conditional because at least one of the three fields -- RQD-2-item code-internal, RQD-3-item code-external or RQD-4-hospital item code -- must be valued.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: An alternate sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: Hospital Item Code
fields.description: This field contains the identifier and description that uniquely identify the item on all applications in the hospital. The identifier is usually controlled by the hospital financial application in the charge description master file. This field is conditional because at least one of the three fields-- RQD-2-item code-internal, RQD-3-item code-external or RQD-4-hospital item code-- must be valued.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: An alternate sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: Requisition Quantity
fields.description: This field contains the quantity requisitioned for this item.

fields.name: Requisition Unit of Measure
fields.description: This field contains the unit of measure for this item.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: An alternate sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: Dept. Cost Center
fields.description: This field contains the accounting code that identifies this department in order to charge for this item . User-Defined Table 0319 - Department Cost Center is used as the HL7 identifier for the user-defined table of values for this field.

fields.name: Item Natural Account Code
fields.description: This field contains the accounting code that identifies this item in order to charge for this item. User-Defined Table 0320 - Item Natural Account Code is used as the HL7 identifier for the user-defined table of values for this field.

fields.name: Deliver To ID
fields.description: This field contains the unique identifier and descriptive name of the department/location where the item should be delivered.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: An alternate sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: Date Needed
fields.description: This field contains the date this item is required.
